tech_news.title: Micron says memory shortage will ‘persist’ beyond 2026 - The Verge
tech_news.description: Micron doesn’t expect the memory shortage to end anytime soon, with CEO Sanjay Mehrotra saying that “tight industry conditions” across DRAM and NAND flash memory are expected to “persist” beyond 2026.
